short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get zero-carbon2030 Carbon Ratings in your Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides Carbon Rating information for companies you search that have been rated by zero-carbon2030. 

This provides transperancy about whether a company you're searching for is concerned about creating meaningful action against climate change.

Use this tool to help advise you as you browse and allow yourself to compare businesses commitment to halting climate change with a real time Carbon Ratings.
